parameters.name: ConfigId
parameters.description: Configuration ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListHttpRequestHeaderModificationRules](~~2867483~~) API.

parameters.name: ConfigType
PageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, defaulting to 1 if not provided.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page, with a maximum of 500. Defaults to 500 if not provided.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: Rule name. This parameter is not required when adding a global configuration.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) API.

parameters.name: SiteVersion
parameters.description: Version number of the site configuration. For sites with version management enabled, you can use this parameter to specify the effective version of the configuration, defaulting to version 0.
